about_the_game:
You'll play as Carmen, a somewhat absent-minded middle-aged lady who lives in a space van wandering through the infinity of the universe. She has a collection of lost objects of all kinds that she has found over the years.

Additionally, she has frequent curious and bizarre visits from strange beings seeking Carmen's help. She provides them with objects that can fix, or worsen, their problems.

To be able to help them, you will need to have a conversation with the visitor to accumulate energy. Depending on your choices, you will accumulate a specific type of energy.

When you have enough energy, Carmen will be able to search for the object with her searching device: The Sonda Nova. To find the object, you will need to complete the puzzles presented in the Sonda Nova.

The precious object, will depend on the energy you have accumulated beforehand.

Upon completion, you will deliver the object to the visitor. Depending on whether they like it or not, the story thread will branch.

Features

  • Comic Sketches - Story divided into comic sketches with lots of flamboyant humor.

  • ASMR Puzzles - Easy-to-learn, relaxing, and highly satisfying puzzles.

  • Flow 2000 - Full of references to the 2000s decade.

  • Branching Story - Multiple endings and combination of decisions throughout the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game might include material that isn't suitable for all age groups or may be inappropriate for the workplace: sexual content, coarse language, use of legal substances, and generally mature themes. It explores issues related to mental health and gender identity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240; AMD A10-5800K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640; Radeon HD 7750; Intel HD Graphics 515
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

short_description: An interactive narrative experience about the most flamboyant beings in the universe. Join Carmen, a somewhat absent-minded middle-aged lady who has to endure bizarre situations in her space truck. And possibly mess things up like crazy.
